question: Based on the given evidence, is the hypothesis 'The Blake McFall Company Building is located in Portland, Oregon.' true, false, or uncertain? content.source_1: The Blake McFall Company Building was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1990.
content.source_2: The Emmet Building is a five-story building located in Portland, Oregon.
content.source_3: The Emmet Building was constructed in 1915.
content.source_4: The Emmet Building is an alternate name for the Blake McFall Company Building.
content.source_5: John works in the Emmet Building.
content.source_6: The company later reused the name “Emmet Building” for a newer office in Beaverton, outside Portland city limits.
content.source_7: Some archives index the Blake McFall Company Building by the firm’s headquarters address in Salem rather than its physical site.
